meanings.sent1: The eensy kitten could fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: I found an eensy spider crawling on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The eensy teacup was perfect for a quick sip of tea.
meanings.sent4: Her eensy voice was barely audible over the noise.
meanings.sent5: The eensy stars twinkled in the dark night sky.

meanings.sent1: Just an eensy bit of sugar is enough for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: She added an eensy of salt to the soup for flavor.
meanings.sent3: The eensy of patience left in him finally ran out.
meanings.sent4: An eensy of kindness can go a long way in brightening someone's day.
meanings.sent5: He felt an eensy of hope flicker in his heart despite the challenges.
